title: New feature - Training Calculator!
content:
A new tool has been added: the Training Calculator.

---

This early version calculates the time required to advance melee skill for knights. Upcoming expansions will include distance skill for paladins, shielding for all vocations, and magic level progression for all vocations as well.
author: Molot

title: December Update #2
content:
A new round of improvements has arrived on Fibulopedia.

---

Here's what's included in December Update #2:

- A fully functional Quests page with all available quest information
- Sell-to NPC info for every item, including prices
- A Loot Value Calculator with an automatic server log analyzer

More updates are coming soon - thanks for all the support and feedback on Discord.
author: Molot

title: December Update #1 - New Features & Improvements
content: A new update has just been released on Fibulopedia, bringing several useful additions and improvements. --- New Features: - Magic Damage Calculator (work in progress) - The first version of the calculator is now available. The values should be close to real in-game numbers, and the tool will continue to be refined. - Travel Routes Tool - A new feature that calculates the cheapest and most efficient travel path between cities. - Updated Monsters Page - The Monsters section now includes every creature that appears in the game, together with their loot information. - Improved Homepage UI - The main page has been redesigned for better clarity and navigation. Coming Soon: - Further refinement of the Magic Damage Calculator - Buy & sell information for every item in the game - An expanded Quests page with all available quests In addition, a new piece of community content is on the horizon - an interview with a special guest, featuring answers to many questions players have been asking. Stay tuned!
author: Molot

title: Welcome to Fibulopedia!
content: Fibulopedia is now live! Explore guide to the Fibula Project - a faithful recreation of classic Tibia 7.1. Please keep in mind that the website is still under construction and more content will be published soon!
author: Molot
